website_summaries.verdict: An attractive rolling cart that can be used indoors or outdoors. Use it to serve up drinks for a summer BBQ or as a spot for gardening tools.
pros: The cart comes in a variety of colors and even folds up so it can be conveniently stored
Looks and works great inside or outside
Made of sturdy metal and has wheels for easy transport
Low-cost and easy to wipe down when it gets dirty
cons: The cart’s finish does have a tendency to scratch easily and it cannot hold very heavy items

customer_reviews.title: Great for a porch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price...I use on my porch to hold a drink dispenser, dishes and placemats. This is a much cheaper option than buying a traditional outdoor bar cart and more colorful as well.
customer_reviews.author: E. L.

customer_reviews.title: For Indoor Use ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart 13 months ago based on reviews and the fact it was listed as both an Indoor and Outdoor cart. Today one wheels fell off from rust (see photos). Also appears the wheel failure was caused by a poor quality weld joint. The cart is made of steel and rusts when placed in a damp or humid environment. My advice to anyone considering purchasing this item is to keep it indoors and dry. Other than the broken wheel and rust, the cart functions and works as advertised. Seller should list the cart as "for indoor use only."
customer_reviews.author: William B. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: So perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked and wanted to review on colors. A previous review said the Teal was an ugly gray so not true. I worried for 2 days it just arrived and I had to unpack asap well it's teal no doubt. I also bought the silver which is kinda an industrial gray and the apple green is very apple green but in a matte way which I really like. So many uses I'm ordering 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cart, love the color, made well and easy to put together all I had to do was screw in the wheels and it was ready to go!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Just remove from box and unfold cart. Nice teal color. Rolls easily in any direction. Decent height. Holds weight of five pieces of medical equiptnent/machines. Easy to clean surface/finish. Only downside for me is access from the back of the cart is occluded by here support bars which block the back lower shelf from being as open and accessible as the front.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart For Bar Usage
customer_reviews.text: Works well for an indoor presentation in my apartment. More of a matte than metallic finish and holds more than one would predict by looking at the photos. If I have any gripe, I wish it were just a little taller, but I read the specs and bought it so that certainly isn't the manufacturer's fault. Happy to stick with it and it's been complimented by guests.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Feltner

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! I bought it to use for my business to transport presentation materials for art classes from my car. It is a beautiful vibrant color! Exactly as pictured, it comes already put together, you just have to easily screw on the wheels. Easy to fold up or open. Exactly what I needed. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: psmadel

customer_reviews.title: My 2 weeks old Cart is rusting! Advertised Indoor/Outdoor !!
customer_reviews.text: My cart is stored under patio cover and left up occasionally beside our hot tub to hold our towels. It has been had sprinkles of rain a couple of times, but it is now rusting and rust dripping onto my concrete patio!!! It was advertised as Indoor/Outdoor so this should NOT happen. I guess we will need to paint with some type of protection to keep it from rusting and damaging our patio? Although it was easy to assemble, etc. etc. I must rate it low - the manufacturer should have used the proper type of paint to be advertised for Outdoor use also.
customer_reviews.author: steve75

customer_reviews.title: The cart is sturdy, but the wheels...!
customer_reviews.text: The cart is very sturdy in terms of carrying food from room to room. HOWEVER, BEWARE THE WHEELS! After about 10 months of use, the wheels started to fail. They don't hold up to heavy use. They become loose as the threads become stripped. There is no way to tighten them when this happens. After tracking down the proper support number (the one listed on Amazon is wrong), I ordered replacement wheels. The manufacturer sent a new set, no charge. Those also wore out. This can be very frustrating as the wheels tend to fail at the wrong time, like when you're carrying something like food on the cart. Because of this, I can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Wrong in so many ways 🙄
customer_reviews.text: First the description is confusing. The picture and color description does not correspond Packaging was in good condition but item was damaged. I ordered a gray and received a maroon/reddish cart. It looks more like a gardening cart than a service cart, not sure if it’s because of the color. Cart was dented in a couple of places and one half of the top shelf wasn’t properly aligned with the other half. So when you open the cart you see a gap between the two pieces of shelves making it impossible to put something on top and keep it straight. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Socarras

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart, Although I use it for a different reason than it was intended, it's perfect. I have COPD and have to limit my walking severely. I was having trouble getting my clean laundry back to the proper places because it required many trips. As a result it would pile up (all folded) on top of my dryer. I saw this cart, the dimensions were great for my use. I purchased it and only had to screw in the wheels. Believe me, it makes part of life much easier and less dependent on my daughter. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jojuno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent folder cart but watch out for the caster screws coming loose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for moving things like laundry baskets around my apartment. I am unsteady on my feet and needed something like that. Cosco has always provided sturdy products, and I got to know them back in the days when my kids were small. This is as good a device as their highchairs were. However if you get one, put some Gorilla glue or similar adhesive on the threads of the bolts that hold the casters onto the legs of the cart. If they get loose, they will wreck the threads in the cart's legs and you can't fix them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: came dented
customer_reviews.text: I loved the 'idea' of the cart, but, unfortunately it was already dented when it came, the wheels didn't screw in easily, (as though the threads were faulty), and it is a bit more flimsy than I expected, and the top isn't actually flat when opened. classes fell over when I tried to roll it to the kitchen. But, I don't know if I feel like the hassle of unscrewing the wheels and putting it back in the box to return. A bit bummed.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: not a nice, blueish teal like shown in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Most of the positive reviews I now see were for a green cart by the same company. I bought the teal cart and it is AWFUL. First, it is not metal, it is plastic; cheap-looking plastic. Second, the color is completely different than shown in the photo. It is actually a turquoise. A deep, bilious turquoise, not a nice, blueish teal like shown in the photo. I would not recommend this product to anyone. I am planning on returning it if the seller will let me. Somehow I am not hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: carolc84

customer_reviews.title: Folding serving cart
customer_reviews.text: OK - I needed a folding cart thing to take to dog shows for all my stuff! I found this cart on the Target website - ordered it - would take too long to get to me. Found the same cart with more options on Amazon got it in 2 days! Yeah! Now I have the one from Target in my garage holding extra stuff and the other one from Amazon for my dog shows! The cart is VERY sturdy, piece of cake to assemble - like put the wheels on it - that's it! Folds up and stores easily! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Helmig

customer_reviews.title: Buy the slatted version
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the brown slatted cart and the white solid surface - I would have preferred slatted and would only purchase that again - the surface of the white shelves is a little flimsy, and aren't as smoothly connected as the slatted version. For the price both are a good value and a decent size. The white's becoming a "work" cart when I'm cleaning the pantry are fridge, the brown is a drinks trolley that is a close match to our outdoor dining table - both will be called into duty for an outdoor party in two weeks with matching tablecloths (try a 60" x 60" size). So handy, and that they fold is money!
customer_reviews.author: Splitrock River

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!
customer_reviews.text: Cleverly designed, easy to assemble, simply screw on the wheels, and a nice black matte finish. Each shelf will support 125 lbs. I am going to use this as a Bar/Food Cart on my patio. For me to have the ability to fold this cute table up, (which a 4-year old could do) makes everything I put on the patio, easy-peasy to put indoors, should a hurricane approach. We live in Florida, and I would not leave this, nor any of my furniture out, during the rainy season. To the Buyer: It's a darned good looking modern design. I put placemats on the shelving to soften the 'black' look at bit. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Compassionata

customer_reviews.title: Almost no assembly
customer_reviews.text: Really like these carts, have three, and you pull it out the box and screw the wheels into the bottom, that's it, nice and easy assembly!! Only issue is that one broke on its second use, the part where you screw the wheel into came off completely. Would probably pay more in return shipping than it would cost to get a new one, bit of a bummer, but maybe can find someone to weld it. Overall though would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Janes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Fold and Unfold - Attached Pic of Instructions note Weight Limits
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality feel and how easy it is to fold and unfold. It is exactly what I had been looking for to hold my crock pot and or George Forman grill, when I want to cook things outside (and keep the smells and heat out of the house). Everything gets so dirty in my yard I didn't want a permanent piece that I'd have to clean up before each use. My friends have been impresssed with the item. Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for anyone with mobility issues.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I’m disabled and use a walker withA basket, which makes taking dishes to and from the table difficult, and also putting groceries away in the pantry. I’m amazed at how easy this was to put together (just putting on wheels) and that I can use it like a walker. I was able to clean off the table in one trip. Planning to get a second one for upstairs. It will hold a lot of items, so moving things from one room to another is a breeze. Wheels m over in any direction easily. When done, a snap to fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Great, well made cart
customer_reviews.text: My cart arrived today. I purchased in the green. It is better than I hoped. Well made, sturdy, folds easily. My husband had no trouble getting it out of the carton and putting the castors on it. The brake for locking the wheels is easy to use. I like the rim on the shelves and the fact that it has handles at both ends. I purchased this one for indoor use. I have already used it in moving something from one room to another. The wheels work fine. Not like some wobbly grocery store cart where one wheel always decides to work independently of the others. I'm thinking about getting two more for outdoors. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cart for the price, so useful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cart specifically to hold painting supplies for our home project. It came quickly and was easily assembled (only had to attach the rolling feet, which are large and move smoothly once attached). The cart rolls well, holds a lot of supplies without buckling (several gallons of paint, etc.) and even cleans off nicely if paint happens to spill on it. Overall just an excellent purchase and extremely helpful for my purpose. I can see it being helpful for any use which requires storing and/or moving items about the house. Best thing is that when I'm finished painting and no longer need it, it will fold so I can store it away until the next project.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Rattles and makes a lot of noise!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it folds. However it rattles and makes too much noise when you push it in the hall. It is like a train is running in the building. Very embarrassing. The wheels looked pretty big and I thought it would run smooth but I was wrong. I didn’t use it until recently and after I found out the problem the rerun window was closed. I wish i could return it. I don’t recommend this to anyone if planning to use it inside your building or outside. It rattles on even surfaces too, forget about pushing on the tile. People get anoid if you push it around them.
customer_reviews.author: kristen y.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Practical, and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these carts. One is brown and the other is red. Their overall construction is outstanding. Nothing wobbles and all connectors are tightly fastened. The red cart has become my portable home office that I use when I want to work in another room of my house. It holds my laptop, portable printer, office supplies, miscellaneous items, and an extra surge protector cord that can be plugged anywhere. I'm no longer just confined to my home office, which I love. My sturdy red cart smoothly rolls anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra R. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Serving cart is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much as I use it for many things. I load it up with many sacks of groceries and roll it into our kitchen and disperse the groceries to where they belong. I use it to move heavy things , just put the things on top and then roll it to where I wish. When many guests are coming, I plan on loading it with dishes and take them to the dining room table and then load it up with the meal and take that to the table also. Then load it with the dirty dishes when the meal is done and take then to the sink and leftovers to the fridge or freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle J. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: just screw the wheels on >>> Does it get any Easier  >?  well made
customer_reviews.text: great cart and all you have to do is screw the wheels on .i got the red planked one for a 36 inch cage . i have to put the cage on sideways ( for the next week ) but it rolls so nice my wife said keep it .its easy , even grandma liked it with the cage across it :) folds up with no effort . , its shipped assembled except for the wheels .
customer_reviews.author: Kingfish

customer_reviews.title: Everyone comments on how handy it is
customer_reviews.text: We have a large outdoor gazebo, when I host book clubs this cart is very handy to load up drinks and snacks to wheel outside. I wish the handles were securely attached as I do need to lift it over 1 step and 1 door threshold and the bar handle is just sitting on the frame. However, it is a smooth ride that looks nice for displaying food/drinks and all the ladies comment how nice it is to not make multiple trips from kitchen to outdoor space. Folds up easily when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Good or bad.... you don't know what you will get.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I received this, one of the wheels did not fit. The return process was quick and easy. I asked for a replacement and it arrived quickly. The wheels fit this time. However,there is a piece of plastic that did not fit right on the cart. Since it did not overly affect the opening and closing of the cart. I kept it. The assembly was easy, it open and fold easily. It looks pretty sturdy. I think it was a good buy. One negative is the quality control is poor, it's like a box of chocolate...you never know what you are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Allison L

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cart for us. We live in an independent living community and have very little room for storage. This cart folds up so it is almost flat and fits in a small space. When we need it (to bring in groceries or plants) it pops open and rolls easily to the car and back to our apartment. The color (Teal) matches items on our patio so we can open it up on the patio to use it anytime. We are amazed at how sturdy it is. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: Quite Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, even not my favorite color but looks really good. Bright, clean, really well made, immaculate paint job. Generally holds our lil Webber grill and propane tank. So f-ing helpful moving into our apartment! Even folded it rolls Smooth, sturdy, easy to pack up/fold! May buy as a gift in future, it’s that delightful...and it’s a cart. My only suggestion would be to add a hook to keep it securely folded for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Was so nice to unpack something well made, pre assembled, and easy to use. Only thing you have to do is screw the wheels in and stretch it into open position and you’re all ready to go. The ease of this cart gave me independence that my arthritis and current surgical weight restrictions sometimes denies me. Very happy with my purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Indy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to fold cart
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Packaging was not the best, came damaged on top rack. A few metal slats are bent and not as sturdy at that section. Its definitely not something you can put a lot of weight on. It's cute and very easy to fold to put away. Completely assembled, just had to screw on wheels. I will not be returning, too much trouble. I did buy a used for cheaper but described as new, in good condition without damage. I like the flat ruby red. It'll suffice for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaD

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases for the patio. It's super sturdy, has 2 roomy shelves. We got it just in time for my son's outdoor movie birthday party and it held so many drinks! It will look great at the pool for cocktails and I've even brought it inside as a bar cart. Assembly was just putting the wheels on. It takes up less than 6" when folded. The instructions said that it wouldn't stand alone folded, but ours does. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: anninsf

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing spoils high rating!
customer_reviews.text: The cart is what I expected. It's sturdy, mobile and the folding away possibility is quite a plus, particularly in our steamy climate in New Orleans. So four stars for that BUT and a big BUT the packing did not prevent the cart from having a dent on one of the upper arms. It is quite obvious and I've had to hide it with a serving towel. The only reason I haven't returned it is because of the cart's bulkiness and weight. All of this could have been prevented with a few cents worth of bubblewrap. Really a false economy.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Mindak

customer_reviews.title: Watch out, it might not come with all its parts!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived without its wheels. I followed the links to obtain missing parts, but the company's website demands a part number supposedly on a booklet that came with the product--no booklet! It demands another number supposedly on a sticker on the product--no sticker! I'm completely unhappy with this purchase. I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not carefree product for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable, 3 star product. Bought this because it was rated for "outdoor" use. I took that to mean rustproof. Not the case. Started rusting already after 2 months especially at "wheel wells" which I already scraped with metal bristled brush and coated with protective Rustoleum paint. Now, though, I'm going to need to spray paint the whole thing cause the joints on the shelves are rusting too. I understand weather is tough on products but this is not a carefree outdoor product. Be prepared to do some touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: music fan

customer_reviews.title: and I can highly recommend it. Assembly required only the putting on of ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of room for putting out food or drinks when I have people over. I can store this in my garage when not in use, and it folds and expands with one quick movement. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it, and I can highly recommend it. Assembly required only the putting on of the wheels, to that was really fast.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy13

customer_reviews.title: Folding Serving Cart
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cart, wagon and utility cart to transport my craft items from one room to another instead of traveling back and forth numerous times. Well, I found the perfect serving cart. This cart holds all my heavy items and with a couple of hooks on the side - holds my matting boards. Rolls very well and when the cart is empty, fold the cart up and tuck away. I believe my husband needs one of these for his shed. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA

customer_reviews.title: Lovely with plants to liven up the kitchen, handy for deploying food etc to dining room
customer_reviews.text: Just unfold it and pop on the wheels (which have locks!) and this sturdy and colorful cart is ready to go. I put orange straw place mats on each level to contrast with the turquoise, and use it to hold plants and containers to add interest to the blank wall when it is "parked". It is big enough to hold and move lots of food and dishes, or even small appliances like slow cookers or InstaPots if you lack cupboard or counter space for them. I plan to use it this summer as an extra spot to put food etc next to the patio dining table. Definitely one of my favorite Amazon purchases!
customer_reviews.author: DisyG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but need some upgrade
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bigger than I expected, but will serve its purpose. I bought it specifically to help myself during party time - instead of multiple runs between kitchen and dining room, I can load dishes on the cart and deliver in one swift ride. :) The reason I put three stars is because of the cart industrial look. I choose it in silver, but it's not silver, but rather flat gray. If I could suggest to the vendor change the color to something more appealing, this would be beneficial for the product outlook.
customer_reviews.author: LanaT

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on my unit at a small hospital. We load it with supplies and roll it about our unit. It is very sturdy and takes a good deal of weight. When not in use it is easily folded and put away in very small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cart for inside as well as outside. Better than any other cart ihave.
customer_reviews.text: Ihave a lot of carts and am so happy I found this one. It just needed the wheels scrwed on. I am 76 andhave problems with weight but not with this. It is sturdy, folds and closes with ease. The large wheels make manuvering it so easy and the wheels are locking. I use it inside to move things from room to room. It holds a lot and i love the handles which i use to helpwith walking.
customer_reviews.author: Eudice

customer_reviews.title: Best for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my rooftop patio for entertaining. I stored it in an outside closet, however I started noticing rust. I live near the ocean and apparently the occasional marine moisture affected the metal, even though the closet is well protected. I found an alternate use for the cart, and it currently holds my office printer and supplies. I like that the cart can be folded away, and that it is on rollers. Good quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: JaLo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of high reviews as "sturdy" & 75 lbs weight per shelf. Want to use it to deliver fondant cakes to venues & need cart that folds. The dent in pic was made with my hand when I pressed in the middle to open it the very first time! No way I would put anything heavy on cart. Quite disappointed. Only good thing is that it folds/unfolds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Rusty after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I've had the cart out in the Portland weather for 1 year, last summer to this summer and there is rust on the cart at the wheels. But it not following apart or anything, just more cosmetic than anything. If you plan to keep it purely outside, I would recommend sealing everywhere that is not red/colored if it rusting will bother you. I have our grill on top and my yeti roadie 20 fits perfectly on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Cart seems sturdy and arrived mostly assembled. Wheels however had to be screwed in using a provided wrench. So not "fully assembled" as claimed. Painful process for arthritic wrists and fingers. The front wheels attached relatively easily; the braking wheels, however, required much more force. Listing should require an arthritis warning of some sort. Otherwise cart looks good, seems sturdy, folds and opens easily.
customer_reviews.author: james d. thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cart
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I couldn't even find another product that functioned this way that was affordable and good looking. We use this for parties to move stuff around or act as the beverage center. It's fantastic that it just folds away. It's well thought out, and the brakes on the wheels are a great inclusion. We got the one without slats because we figured it's better for sitting things like glasses on. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: fishgeek

customer_reviews.title: NICE CART BUT IT HAS A FEW PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cart to hold our portable gas grill. Had to buy an 8mm - 1.25 tap to clear the threads in three of the legs. This added another $6.53 to the cost of the cart. Seems to be pretty well made so you would think they could thread holes for the wheel studs! In another review someone asked if you could put a propane tank on the lower shelf and they were told yes\\\"YES" by one of the existing customers. NOTE: IT WILL NOT ACCEPT A STANDARD 20# PROPANE TANK ON THE LOWER SHELF! Tank is too tall to go between the upper and lower shelves. It is also probably way too heavy for the lower shelf to support!
customer_reviews.author: Jamtn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice serving cart.
customer_reviews.text: This cart is perfect. We love the way it folds up, and it has a lot of shelf space with nice tall handles. It has large wheels that will roll easily on a hard floor as well as carpet. There WAS a small dent on the bottom shelf when we unpacked it, but we were able to easily tap it out with a small block and a hammer. We're very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: This cart deserves 6 stars for cost and function
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! I have been thinking of getting a couple of folding carts that I can throw in the back of my car for several months. I started by ordering one. It arrives assembled apart from the wheels. This cart is very sturdy for it's weight and the two shelves are at a convenient height. Loved it so much (especially the sale price) that I have ordered a second one as many weeks. I am a prolific Amazon shopper but rarely write reviews - this product deserves 6 stars for cost and function!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rolling cart
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars! It is not light weigh but really easy to collapse for storage. The raised edge around the trays prevent items from rolling off the cart. The handles are not huge like a similar cart I saw at HomeGoods. The color red is more a brick red that gives a nice color punch in my mother’s kitchen. I bought this cart to free up her very limited counter space. The half star deduction is for the wheels. Wheels are nice and big and really easy to operate the stop/go levers, but I can’t twist 2 of them all in. In the end I had to set all 4 wheels half way in to prevent wobbliness.
customer_reviews.author: Anony MouseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be an outdoor plant stand. I don't not recommend this be used outdoors. We have had this cart for approximately 1 year. Came in during the winter but otherwise left outside. This design is destined to fail. The welds that hold the slats in place are underneath the rails. When it inevitably rusts, the slats drop and so does anything else on it. This has resulted in a minor catastrophe. If you're looking for a cute rolling cart for your indoor plants this will work well. Outdoors? I would find another alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I would have working space when BBQ'ing. I love it! Easy to fold & unfold. These table has been used again and again in many different ways. Easy to store in small places when folded. If you need an extra table for special occasions or celebrations and have a small place, I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cart. It is so convenient for moving from one apartment to another. It folds and straightens easily with no effort. It is heavier than I would like, but I can lift it. I wish it had a lever to lock it in the folded position. The wheels do have stop levers. It moves well and required minimal assembly.
customer_reviews.author: flutiemusix

customer_reviews.title: Thin finish
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with multiple paint chips to the finish and small dents. Didn't make the product unuseable and since I will probably inflict more damage as I will be using this outdoors, I didn't return. That said, if you're expecting a perfect product out of the box -- you might be a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart but does not hold up....BEWARE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: after one month (and used about 4 times) the bottom leg (with wheel attached) fell out and cannot be put back due to the metal (streaching) from what i hear this is a quality control problem, and from what i see it cannot be fixed...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Hardman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I wanted black, but it was out of stock, and I ordered the slatted version, but was sent the solid cart. The jury is still out. It does serve its purpose though, and was very easy to assemble (unfold and screw on the wheels). It's a bit more wobbly than I wanted - it feels flimsy when I scrape my grill, but it wasn't costly and the size works.
customer_reviews.author: CrewJulie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Easy to open. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this folding cart!! Nice enough to use anywhere and practical enough to use in your garage. Strong, nice finish. AND... I am adding this a few months later... I use it as a changing table! We have a new granddaughter.. I attached a changing table pad to this, so I can still fasten the strap around her tummy. It is perfect! Will not work for a one year old... would not be long enough and they would bump their head!
customer_reviews.author: shelleychez

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able to take things between my apartment on the 6th floor up to the roof of my building (which has some grills and tables). This cart has worked so well over the course of the spring and summer. I can carry lot, it doesn't get scratched up, and the Teal one is attractive enough that I leave it out in my apartment a lot of the time, and then I got a second grey one that a fold up and leave in my closet. I've been recommending these carts to other people in my building all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: fits under my BBQ grill cover when folded
customer_reviews.text: I am using this cart as a prep station and for my induction cook top for outdoor use. It is awesome. I place a cutting board on the top shelf to support my appliance and to hold the utensils and food. Best part is that when folded, it will fit inside of my BBQ grill cover. excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems great for a barbecue cookware cart.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart to haul cookware to and from an outdoor deck. It came fully assembled and folded in a box. The color is an attractive dark rust red. The wheels seem very substantial for this size of cart. My suggestions to the manufacturer are to also offer hooks for hanging cookware and a matching cover for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Pelican By The Sea

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Great rack with wheels. Love how easy it folds up and can be put away "space saver" style. We use this to help put out inventory in my shop. Makes it easy to do and the job is done twice as fast since using this cart. Update: Sadly after almost a year of use one of the wheels has broken off and cannot be repaired. I'm not sure if we were too rough with it or if this is the typical lifespan for this product. Regardless, I still think it's worth the money and will probably order a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to my porch. It is well made, no assembly required but screwing the wheels on. The lime green is powder coated onto the metal. I'm using it as a plant stand. I love it. I sent a picture of it to a friend, and she liked it so much that I bought one for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart in December 2019 About a month ago the wheels started to fall off.they are screw on wheels but do not hold I contacted the company to get new wheels and was told to call back in six weeks.the wheels were not in stock and were coming from China. I went on you tube to see if the wheels could be fixed I tried everything I have not been able to reach amazon.there is no phone number,chat is not available. I am exhausted with this cart which I use for moving laundry or setting the table Be very very careful.this cart is not a reliable investment.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn dooley

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to set up a sewing area. I ordered two, left a space between them and put a board on top to create a work table. The dimensions of the carts are perfect to fit storage bins of fabric. I looked a long time before I found the right depth and shelf height for this purpose. And I love the color (red).
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this rolling cart!! It is so handy to be able to fold & roll away when not in use. And so convenient to quickly unfold & use. I've used it a lot for our outdoor bbqs. So versatile to carry everything I need outdoors. And it holds a lot! Love the red color. Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: sherry shelton

customer_reviews.title: You WillLove It!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cart. No assembly except slipping on wheels. Large and holds a lot. Easy to fold. Easily rolls. Very attractive. Got it in red. Loved it so much I ordered three more. Great cart to serve food on as well as to use it to transport groceries, water bottles or tools. Kept two in garage, one in backyard and one in house. Made of Steele and very durable
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: I want another one of these!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, practical cart. I bought it for a drink cart for outdoor parties, but I have found so many other uses for it. It is quickly put together (attach wheels) and it folds and unfolds easily and smoothly. It doesn't take up much space when folded and is light enough to easily carry from the garage to wherever I need it. It's much more convenient to use as a temporary table for sorting or organizing than setting up a folding table, as this can be rolled out of the way or items wheeled on it to another part of the house. I bought it in green, which is a bright but not obnoxious shade of green.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better out there
customer_reviews.text: This cart has the right height, the right size and is very easy to use. The locking wheels are a great addition. I have used many different carts and this one gets very compact when folded, and is higher and wider than most other carts on Amazon. I cannot stress enough about how awesome this cart is!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcghee

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, versatile and durable.
customer_reviews.text: This thing still looks good a year later. I have eaten on it, used it as a craft table, used it as an entertainment center. No big scratches, just a little dirty. I never really folded it up, but it does fold easily and into a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Lexxy

customer_reviews.title: Really like this cart!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is "no assembly" other than screwing those casters on. And they are very good quality casters. The cart is sturdy and yet lightweight. Very attractive. Nice matte finish. Easy to maneuver. And it folds for storage. I bought one for a gift and am ordering another for me.
customer_reviews.author: Da Pearl

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding product. It holds a goodly amount of food platters and accessories for outdoor barbecuing, conveniently, and with good stability. It is light weight plus folds and unfolds easily, requiring minimal storage space. We like it so much, we are going to get another to deliver platters from the kitchen to the dining room for large dinners. It rolls easily and locks in place when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my balcony to put my summer herbs on. It is a beautiful addition to my balcony. It's also great to be able to move the plants around with ease, especially if there is a bad storm. I have received numerous compliments on how good it looks on my balcony.
customer_reviews.author: bearbear

customer_reviews.title: Well made and handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with an electric roaster/smoker unit and it's just right. I was really glad that I bought this, because the first time I wanted to use my smoker it had to go in the garage out of the rain. Well made and folds up nicely it of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this product to hold a small outdoor grill on my deck. It's exactly what I hoped for. It's very sturdy and well made. I ignored the color when I bought it. The only assembly was putting the wheels on the legs. Otherwise, it's ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Woman

customer_reviews.title: Not quite high enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a bar cart on our patio. Unfortunately, the height was misleading. The actual height is of the two side rails, while the surface for holding the bar items is quite low. This cart would be ideal if it was higher, and closer to actual bar height. It folded nicely and rolled well, but just seemed to low and dwarfed for our use. Had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: pe-00

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Lightweight, Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cart! I bought it as a TV stand for our back deck. We have a 37” TV that now so easily rolls to wear we need it. I love the color, the matte finish, everything! The wheels roll smoothly and it was too easy to assemble! Just pushed the wheels in to the legs. I highly recommend this lightweight cart!
customer_reviews.author: SFW

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rooftop Patio Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: We have a rooftop where we do a lot of entertaining. However it became difficult to transport food, utensils, grilling items to the roof. We have an elevator, but it still required lots of trips. These carts (I now have 3) are great for transporting food and we also place the cooked food and utensils there when it’s time to eat. They are sturdy, fold flat, wipe easily and roll smoothly. The legs also have a rolling lock to keep the carts in place. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: southerngirlnchi

customer_reviews.title: Faulty parts
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart. It is attractive and sturdy...but this is my third cart because the wheels keep falling off. The first two carts after less than a year of use, the wheels start wobbling then fall off and cannot be tightened. When assembling the wheels on this third cart I covered the screw with Gorilla Glue then screwed them in. I am hopeful that this keeps the wheels on or I give up!
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Cabai

customer_reviews.title: Cosco Outdoor Living 87501APG1E Indoor/Outdoor Folding Serving Cart, Apple Green
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cart I've ordered. Very easy to set up. I use one in the dining room for storing wine, glasses, etc. and another one elsewhere for all my paints, brushes, pencils and art supplies. Nice that you can lock the wheels to keep it from migrating. Very well made,
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lee

customer_reviews.title: Large sturdy work surface
customer_reviews.text: The cart is large and sturdier than I figured it might be. I'm using it to assist in packing because it's difficult for me to stand for long periods of time. I put stuff I want to pack on the cart, wheel it to my easy-chair chair, and I'm able to work much longer at a time with your systems of the cart
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Jones

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: You can spend a fortune on your outdoor "room." But this is cheap, cute, and STURDY. Just ordered a second for our screened in porch. Sturdy but not clunky. Folds to,store away for winter. Functions as a bar cart. Second will roll outside to use on the patio where the charcoal grill is.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This looks good on my lanai. Open the box, and pronto, it's done - as it arrives put together! It can be suitable for just about anything. I keep my monarchs habitats on I and store things needed on the lower shelf. I have had it a coupe of months - I think it will last a very long time. OOPS! you do have to pop on the wheels! Then Pronto!
customer_reviews.author: agypsyfoot2

customer_reviews.title: Really a great card and a great deal looks beautiful works great
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cart I think it is a fantastic value for the money I got it to transport my sewing machine and supplies to school with me. none of the sewing bags I could find were sturdy enough for my heavy machine so I got this and it worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Danger

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic cart,  but not industrial looking
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great. We use it indoors, as a drinks cart. It went together easily, rolls smoothly and will store neatly when we need to get it out of the way. The box was pretty beat up, so I wouldn't have been surprised if it had been damaged, but it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: llama mama

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a good well built service cart this is the one I have look for one at a fair price for a long time . This unit is well built and has H D casters . Not the cheep plastic one's like many others have.. And like others have said you can fold it up and put it out of the way till you need it again.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: - Very easy and quick to assemble. - Very sturdy. - Fold with easy and opens with ease without noise, doesn't make metal kinda noise when folding or opening. - Takes very less space when folded. (Let me know if you found my review helpful by clicking helpful below)
customer_reviews.author: Umm Ruqaiya

customer_reviews.title: FOR IN DOOR USE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart 2 years ago based on reviews and the fact it was listed as both an Indoor and Outdoor cart. Rusting everywhere . The cart is made of steel and rusts when placed in a damp or humid environment. My advice to anyone considering purchasing this item is to keep it indoors and dry. Other than the rust, the cart functions and works as advertised. Seller should list the cart as "for indoor use only."
customer_reviews.author: Pat Conrad

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was needing and looking for. Light weight, easy to maneuver, right size, seems to fit in the right place as I need it, folds and unfold easily for optimal storage. Love the brown color. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SC LIPIRA

customer_reviews.title: A must have when Catering
customer_reviews.text: This Cart is built very study therefore it is on the heavy side, which is a good thing, You can deliver food on the top tray and retrieve dirty one on the botton tray. Great buy.....
customer_reviews.author: Mildred M Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is sturdy and easy to fold for storage. I use it when I’m doing laundry because I have limited space. It’s great for holding laundry baskets and so easy to store. I would definitely use it for serving food if that need arises. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tetontime

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more durable around the wheels.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and works even better however make sure you don't exceed the weight limit. The legs where the wheels connect will bend and the wheels will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Handy poolside cart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for pool area. great for holding towels, snacks & drink dispenser. Also use for outdoor eating area - load up in kitchen and roll everything out to set table and for food delivery. No more balancing acts to open slider door with one hand with platters of food. This folds away for storage which is great, but I keep in an alcove for pool towel storage for next event. Wheels are easy to roll, not cheap little plastic jobbies. Quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this folding cart
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart. When we need it we roll it out and use it to set snacks on by our pool or as an additional surface to set things while we use the outdoor grill. When we’re done, we fold it up and store it in the garage. It looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: mack77

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Holidays!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the serving tray for my Mom, she loves it! She was running out of room for the food on the table for our holiday meals, so she uses this for additional room and makes it easy to serve the goodies that don't fit on the dinning room table for our holiday meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this little cart is absolutely perfect! I opened the box, unfolded it and put it outside! It holds my patio pitcher and cups in a tray and my towels for the pool (with room to spare). The wheels make it even better, I can push it close to the pool for easy access!
customer_reviews.author: BBMTN

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great cart. Why didn't I buy this years ago? Don't hesitate. I have found it useful for several jobs. Good for rolling out of the kitchen to the table with dishes and food and then later with dirty dishes. Also use this to load groceries from the garage. I just wheel it to the door before leaving for the store and then load it without having to carry a couple of bags at a time to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cat lover.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I had this cart for 6 weeks before one of the wheels fell off. The bolt is completely stripped. I thought "Eh, that's annoying but I'll replace the bolts on the casters." No can do. Ace didn't have anything but tiny casters that would fit the cart. I'm hoping that Home Depot or Lowe's has replacements that will work. Or I might try some metal to metal epoxy if I can't find replacement wheels. If it stays functional, it's perfect for what I need. If not, it was a waste of $60 and an addition to the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not an ideal bar cart, but useful otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cart that I bought as a bar cart/a cart to showcase all of my plants. It’s decently priced and super mobile as it folds up and is on wheels. The thing I do not like about it is since it folds up and it is metal, the center of the cart bubbles up so you can’t really put bottles/glasses/plants there. If you do, it will slide to the other side unless it is heavy enough to pop the metal down flat. I would say to buy something else if ou are looking for a bar cart, but I’d you are using it for serving, planting, holding or storing things, I would say it’s pretty useful.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, easy to use, very cute, very sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: at work I end up getting lots of team lunches and while our reception keeps a cart, it is never there when i need it. I saw this little beauty and scooped it up. It folds super easy, no tools required to assemble. I wish the handles were a wee bit higher as when I am in heels it's a little low to push around. I get a lot of ooohs and ahhhs when I have this out. and when I don't need it stows away easily! Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.author: jijiferjonesTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

product_meta.title: Cosco Indoor/Outdoor Serving Cart, Folding, Brown
product_meta.description:
Color:Brown| Style Name:Slatted

Cosco's SMARTFOLD serving cart is perfect for outdoor entertaining as it provides additional storage space for drinks and plates. It gives an opportunity to transform your outdoor space quickly with its no tool assembly. Cosco also offers an entire SMARTFOLD outdoor furniture line that provides an upscale look at an affordable price. Cosco's SMARTFOLD lounge chair encourages customization of an outdoor space by offering the ability to be a lounge chair, loveseat, or a couch.
feature_bullets: Cosco’s colorful collection of INTELLIFIT outdoor rolling carts fold to a compact 5.1 inch W x 19.3 inch D x 42.5 inch H for quick and easy storage
The easy to maneuver indoor ; outdoor serving carts feature 4 durable wheels including 2 locking casters
Dimensions are: Outdoor Cart 33.0 inch W x 19.3 inch D x 33.7 inch H
The outdoor folding cart requires no assembly and is easy to unpack and use in minutes
Each sturdy shelf holds up to 75 pounds making this the perfect to serve your favorite foods and beverages

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,341 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
